I can only imagine the negative reviews are politically motivated. 

This is a very good and entertaining movie. Hamill is great as are the rest of the cast except perhaps Driver\, but all things of opinion are a matter of taste.

I will see it again while it is in theaters\, and I have to drive close to 60 miles to do so.
